misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Tampere, Finland, and represents Golf Pirkkala with distinction. Known for his quiet demeanor and thoughtful approach to the game, Ofri brings a unique perspective to the competition. This year marks Ofri's third appearance at the prestigious tournament.

A man of simple pleasures, Ofri is known to appreciate the finer details of golf course architecture. He often reflects on the thoughtful designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, admiring his ability to blend strategy and aesthetics.

While the quest for the coveted Hector Trophée continues for Ofri, his participation undoubtedly enriches the event. The golfing community looks forward to watching him compete in the upcoming tournament.
